name: Lord of Coin
description:
My LD40 submission. 

Missed a day ( family issues) and didn’t really have enough time to finish, but its playable !!!      .

Sound and music is cc0 from opengameart.com. Everything else is by me.

Controls

WASD = Movement ARROW KEYS = Shoot

Description

Collect as many coins as you can before your die. Collecting coins increases the size of your coin purse which slows you down. Collecting coins also wakes the undead :S.
